subject: Automobile Racing
Talladega Superspeedway
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch showed a veteran’s poise and a youngster’s daring in winning his second Sprint Cup race of the season Sunday in the Aaron’s 499 at Talladega Superspeedway.
snippet: Kyle Busch showed a veteran’s poise and a youngster’s daring in winning his second Sprint Cup race of the season Sunday in the Aaron’s 499 at Talladega Superspeedway.
